body:
@wojtek-t, I'm running a kubemark test right now, but this is what I see in the cloud console. It seems OK to me. I'll report back whether the eventual output mentions redis. Note that I am using kubernetes/kubernetes@dff7490, which was a while ago. Maybe there was a usage of redis at that point?

![screen shot 2016-03-09 at 10 56 21 am](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/104030/13641206/9a3d5f34-e5e5-11e5-9724-898e3a16ea97.png)
